issues.description: The problem statement’s UML shows `+acceptSupplyDelivery(String, int, int): void`, implying a public method, but in the solution it is declared without an access modifier (package-private). Students following the spec and writing `public static void acceptSupplyDelivery(...)` will find the reference implementation does not match the expected visibility.
issues.suggested_fix: In `SealSaloon.java`, change the signature to `public static void acceptSupplyDelivery(String name, int price, int quantity)` so it matches the UML’s public visibility.
